LanguageData.DW_SettingsGroup_DualWieldSelection_Desc: Configure which weapons can be used alongside another weapon. Dual wield weapons cannot be used alongside two handed weapons, but they can be used with normal (non-dual wield/non-two handed) weapons or other dual wield weapons.
LanguageData.DW_SettingsGroup_TwoHandSelection_Descri: Configure which weapons require both hands to be used. Dual wield weapons cannot be used alongside two handed weapons.
LanguageData.DW_SettingsGroup_Penalties_Description: Configure how severe penalties for dualwielding are.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_StaticCooldownPenOffHand_Desc: Penalty to off hand weapon cooldown when dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_StaticCooldownPMainHand_Descr: Penalty to main hand weapon cooldown when dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_StaticAccPOffHand_Description: Penalty to off hand weapon accuracy when dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_StaticAccPMainHand_Descriptio: Penalty to main hand weapon accuracy when dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_DynamicCooldownP_Description: Extra penalty to cooldown for each level a pawn is below the maximum shooting/melee level when dual wielding. This penalty applies to both weapons.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_DynamicAccP_Description: Extra penalty to accuracy for each level a pawn is below the maximum shooting/melee level when dual wielding. This penalty applies to both weapons.
LanguageData.DW_SettingsGroup_Drawing_Description: Alter how dual wielded weapons are drawn for the south and north view of non-aiming pawns. East/west/aiming drawing should be ok by default, so no extra configuration options are present for those views. The unit of measurement for angles is degrees, and the angles are relative to the default angles in the unmodded game.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_Note_Drawing: Hint: A good way to see the effect of any of these settings is to equip a pawn with a weapon affected by the setting, make sure it's still visible while having the settings window open, change the setting, and press enter. You'll immediately see the change!
LanguageData.DW_Setting_MeleeAngle_Description: The angle relative to the vanilla angle at which pawns hold their melee weapon in north/south view while dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_RangedAngle_Description: The angle relative to the vanilla angle at which pawns hold their ranged weapon in north/south view while dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_MeleeXOffset_Description: The horizontal offset relative to the center of the pawn at which the pawn holds his melee weapons while dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_RangedXOffset_Description: The horizontal offset relative to the center of the pawn at which the pawn holds his ranged weapons while dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_MeleeZOffset_Description: The vertical offset relative to the center of the pawn at which the pawn holds his melee weapons while dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_RangedZOffset_Description: The vertical offset relative to the center of the pawn at which the pawn holds his ranged weapons while dual wielding.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_MeleeMirrored_Description: If this is checked, dual wielded melee weapons will be drawn mirrored in regards to each other.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_RangedMirrored_Description: If this is checked, dual wielded ranged weapons will be drawn mirrored in regards to each other.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_CustomRotations_Title: Click a weapon to set its custom rotation.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_DualWield_DisabledReason: This weapon is configured as two-handed weapon as well. Two-handed weapons cannot be dual wielded, and therefore this configuration has no effect.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_TwoHand_DisabledReason: This weapon is configured as a dual wield weapon as well. Two-handed weapons cannot be dual wielded, and therefore this setting overrides the dual-wield configuration.
LanguageData.DW_Setting_NPCDualWieldChance_Descriptio: Chance a given NPC (enemy or friendly) uses dual wielding, provided it did not spawn with a two-handed weapon.
LanguageData.DW_Message_UnequippedOffHand: {0} dropped {1} off-hand weapon to make room for a two-handed weapon.
LanguageData.DW_NoTwoHandedInOffHand: Cannot wear two-handed weapon as off-hand
LanguageData.DW_CannotBeOffHand: Not configured as dual-wieldable weapon in mod options
